subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic beat Roger Federer by 6-4, 4-6, 6-2 in the Swiss Indoors final in Basel, Switzerland. Djokovic saved five break points to clinch the first set.
snippet: Novak Djokovic beat Roger Federer by 6-4, 4-6, 6-2 in the Swiss Indoors final in Basel, Switzerland. Djokovic saved five break points to clinch the first set.
